title: (x) Two Typefaces Almost Gotham & ... - Edwardian Script Alt, similar to Sackers/Engravers Gothic {Rainer, Florian}
author: Sebastian Ziegler

comments.content:
Hi Sebastian,  
the ‘SERIES №1’ part is most likely custom. Similar typefaces include [Sackers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161818/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sackers-gothic/) or [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161818/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/engravers-gothic/).  
F
Fantastic, thank you for the help.
